channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Monoliths & Dimensions
channel.description: ![1667627d9e97d4f639a36d256fef7426|463x500](upload://ronBbp5yjpOJZBiOYXvmfWQJtON.png) Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded via Streamyard and put on YouTube assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in January. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest. [date=2021-01-09 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-01-09 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOSmG9_uFidnVeVCNvT [date=2021-01-16 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-01-16 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOSmpRphOBPxwxyyxPw [date=2021-01-23 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2021-01-23 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOSnK143Q--RAWhxq80!

item.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Monoliths & Dimensions
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

1667627d9e97d4f639a36d256fef7426587×633 386 KB

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded via Streamyard and put on YouTube assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in January. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using the X-Card and other safety tools players suggest.
Saturday, January 9, 2021 5:00 PM → Saturday, January 9, 2021 8:00 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOSmG9_uFidnVeVCNvT
Saturday, January 16, 2021 5:00 PM → Saturday, January 16, 2021 8:00 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOSmpRphOBPxwxyyxPw
Saturday, January 23, 2021 5:00 PM → Saturday, January 23, 2021 8:00 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MOSnK143Q--RAWhxq80!
